head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BERGMAN, THEODORE O.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BERGMAN, THEODORE O.

block.p: BERGMAN-Theodore O. On Saturday, October 28, 2000, of Ft. Lee, NJ. Beloved husband of the late Harriet. Devoted husband of Irene. Loving father of David Bergman, Janet Buchholz, Laura Zucker. Stepfather of Daniel, Julia and Max Goldensohn. Also survived by six grandchildren and six step-grandchildren. Brother of Dorothy. Services will be held at Schwartz Brothers Memorial Chapel, 114-03 Queens Blvd., Forest Hills, NY. Friends and relatives are invited to attend. Call Schwartz Brothers (718) 263-7600 for more information.
